sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Segregates services JSON object to array of object.

Inputs :

  • JSON String - SAP services JSON payload.
  • Delimiter - Character that separate strings

Outputs :

  • - Array of objects containing below fields:
    • Service Master Data - Objects containing these fields:
      • Client
      • Activity Number
      • Date on Which Record Was Created
      • Name of Person Who Created the Object
      • Date of Last Change
      • Name of person who changed object
      • Deletion Indicator
      • Material Group
      • Base Unit of Measure
      • Numerator for conversion of meins into iwein
      • Service Category
      • Package number
      • International Article Number
      • Category of International Article Number
      • Division
      • Authorization Group
      • General Purchasing Status for Serviceq
      • Validity Date for Purchasing Status
      • Valuation Class
      • Hierarchy Service Number
      • Primary language for object texts
      • Wage type
      • Short Description of Service Type
      • Edition of Service Type
      • Standard Service Catalog Item
      • Tax Indicator for Service (Purchasing)
      • Denominator for Conversion
      • Unit for Work
      • Formula Number
      • Uniform resource locator
      • Tax Tariff Code
      • Short Text Change Allowed
      • Service Short Text
  • Total Rows - Return the total number of records present in SAP Payload.
  • Action Status - Object containing following fields:
    • Code - If the request is executed successfully, code will be set to 0 but if the request failed, code will be set to 1.
    • Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Segregate Service Master Response

Segregates services JSON object to array of object.

Inputs :

  • JSON String - SAP services JSON payload.
  • Delimiter - Character that separate strings

Outputs :

  • - Array of objects containing below fields:
    • Service Master Data - Objects containing these fields:
      • Client
      • Activity Number
      • Date on Which Record Was Created
      • Name of Person Who Created the Object
      • Date of Last Change
      • Name of person who changed object
      • Deletion Indicator
      • Material Group
      • Base Unit of Measure
      • Numerator for conversion of meins into iwein
      • Service Category
      • Package number
      • International Article Number
      • Category of International Article Number
      • Division
      • Authorization Group
      • General Purchasing Status for Serviceq
      • Validity Date for Purchasing Status
      • Valuation Class
      • Hierarchy Service Number
      • Primary language for object texts
      • Wage type
      • Short Description of Service Type
      • Edition of Service Type
      • Standard Service Catalog Item
      • Tax Indicator for Service (Purchasing)
      • Denominator for Conversion

      • Tax Tariff Code

      • Service Short Text

    • Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.
